org.pircbotx

Class UserChannelDao<U extends User,C extends Channel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pircbotx.UserChannelDao<U,C>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UserChannelDaoSnapshot

    public class UserChannelDao<U extends User,C extends Channel>
extends Object
implements Closeable
    Model that creates and tracks Users and Channel and maintains relationships. This includes channel users, channel op/voice/etc users, private messages, etc

    All methods will throw a NullPointerException when any argument is null

    Author:
    Leon Blakey
    See Also:
    User, Channel

    • Method Detail

      • getUser

        public U getUser(@NonNull
                 String nick)
          throws DaoException
        Lookup user by nick, throwing a DaoException if not found
        Parameters:
        nick - The nick of the user
        Returns:
        Known active User
        Throws:
        DaoException - If user does not exist, exception will contain DaoException.Reason.UnknownUser and the nick that doesn't exist

      • getUser

        public U getUser(@NonNull
                 UserHostmask userHostmask)
        Lookup user by UserHostmask, throwing a DaoException if not found
        Parameters:
        userHostmask - The hostmask of the user
        Returns:
        Known active User
        Throws:
        DaoException - If user does not exist, exception will contain DaoException.Reason.UnknownUserHostmask, hostmask, and wrapped exception with nick

      • createUser

        public U createUser(@NonNull
                    UserHostmask userHostmask)
        Create a user from a hostmask, internally called when a valid, real user contacts us
        Parameters:
        userHostmask - The hostmask of the user
        Returns:
        Active User that was created

      • getAllUsers

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<U> getAllUsers()
        Get all currently known users, except from just joined channels where the WHO response hasn't finished (listen for UserListEvent instead)
        Returns:
        An immutable set of the currently known users
        See Also:
        UserListEvent

      • getNormalUsers

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<U> getNormalUsers(@NonNull
                                                                      C channel)
        Gets all currently known users in a channel who do not hold a UserLevel (op/voice/etc). A UserListEvent for the channel must of been dispatched before this method will return complete results
        Parameters:
        channel - Known channel
        Returns:
        An immutable sorted set of Users

      • getUsers

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<U> getUsers(@NonNull
                                                                C channel,
                                                                @NonNull
                                                                UserLevel level)
        Gets all currently known users in a channel that hold the specified UserLevel. A UserListEvent for the channel must of been dispatched before this method will return complete results
        Parameters:
        channel - Known channel
        level - Level users must hold
        Returns:
        An immutable sorted set of Users

      • getLevels

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<UserLevel> getLevels(@NonNull
                                                                         C channel,
                                                                         @NonNull
                                                                         U user)
        Gets all currently known levels (op/voice/etc) a user holds in the channel. A UserListEvent for the channel must of been dispatched before this method will return complete results
        Parameters:
        channel - Known channel
        user - Known user
        Returns:
        An immutable sorted set of UserLevels

      • getNormalUserChannels

        public com.google.common.collect.ImmutableSortedSet<C> getNormalUserChannels(@NonNull
                                                                             U user)

        Parameters:
        user - Known user
        Returns:
        An immutable sorted set of Channels
